Detailed Description

An MenuItem is returned by calling Menu::add().

The following example demonstrates how to use the MenuItem

 #include <com/gaia/R.h>

 bool Page::onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu* menu) {
     MenuItem* item = menu->add(String("title"));
     item->setIcon(com::gaia::common::R::drawable::btn_search);
     item->setShowAsAction(MenuItem::SHOW_AS_ACTION_IF_ROOM);
     return true;
 }
See also:
Menu

Definition at line 40 of file MenuItem.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gaia::core::MenuItem::show_display
Enumerator:
SHOW_AS_ACTION_NEVER 

Never show this item as a button in an Action Bar.

SHOW_AS_ACTION_IF_ROOM 

Show this item as a button in an Action Bar if the system decides there is room for it.

SHOW_AS_ACTION_ALWAYS 

Always show this item as a button in an Action Bar.

SHOW_AS_ACTION_WITH_TEXT 

When this item is in the action bar, always show it with a text label even if it also has an icon specified.
